title: UniqXmas Personalized Family of 4 Christmas Ornament 2023 | Family of Six Present Peeking Over Bannister for Xmas Tree | Customized Unique Keepsake Gift | Custom Name & Year - Free Customization
features: 2023 PERFECT PERSONALIZED FAMILY CHRISTMAS ORNAMENT: Sitting around the Christmas tree is your time to make memories. Nothing is more memorable than custom-made, unique ornaments. While you’re watching the fire roar with warmth, glance over at your premium quality Xmas ornament. BONUS: ornament comes with a complimentary ribbon loop matching your ornament for easy hanging and decoration.

CUSTOMIZED by an ARTIST: Our team works with a calligraphy artist who has 10+ years of experience writing and decorating ornaments to offer you a complimentary FREE text personalization option along with a FREE decorative embellishment option around your text. The letters and designs are handwritten with a special permanent ink that does not smear, smudge, or come off in long-term storage. Guaranteed NO whiteout or paint correction on your ornament text.

ECO-FRIENDLY, LIGHT and DURABLE ALTERNATIVE TO PORCELAIN: We use high-quality, durable and environmentally friendly cast resin, hand painted for a vibrant indoor ornament appearance. Cast resin has the looks of porcelain, yet a lightweight structure that is suitable even for small artificial tree branches. Porcelain creates a lot of hairline surface cracks in long term storage while cast resin is resistant to long term storage as well.

FREE CUSTOMIZATION INSTRUCTIONS: Customize your elegant ornament into a unique memorable gift for FREE as follows: Click the “Customize Now” button upper right section, enter the personal information (names, year, message) in the relevant boxes, and choose if you want a complimentary decorative embellishment or not. Please check the spelling and use only Latin characters to minimize potential errors. If you are using a mobile device, check your personalization’s preview picture by scrolling up.

MOST COMPREHENSIVE WARRANTY IN THE MARKET: Our warranty is as extensive as covering shipping damages with a hassle-free swift online process. Additionally, enjoy a lifetime warranty against hairline surface cracks due to long-term storage temperature changes. If you are not pleased with your order in any way, just give us a chance to make it right with a quick message! Our team is 24/7 at your service to address any concerns or problems.
description: Made with high-quality and durable polyresin, our ornaments ensure long-lasting use. Our ornaments are super light and have a ribbon loop which makes them easy to attach to the Christmas tree branches.

THE PERFECT GIFT

If you want to surprise your family member, sister, mother, cousin, child, grandkid,grandparents, friend or coworker with a Christmas gift they won’t likely forget, consider this beautiful ornament today.
